Significant Weather Information

Issued for: Severe or extreme turbulence not associated with T-storms, severe icing, widespread dust storms or sandstorms which lower visibility to less than 3 miles or volcanic ash.

SIGMETs are valid for 4 hours (except for hurricanes when they are issued for 6 hours).

(https://www.aviationweather.gov/sigmet/help)
